trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheSettingsCollection"></xref> elements.
This class cannot be inherited.

The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheSettingsCollection> class represents the collection of configuration elements and settings that configure an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCache> class.
In other words, this settings collection contains objects that represent elements and settings that are children of a `memoryCache` element.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheSettingsCollection> class contains a `namedCaches` element.

For more information about the configuration options that are related to this class, see [\<memoryCache\> Element (Cache Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/memorycache-element-cache-settings.md) and [\<namedCaches\> Element (Cache Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheSettingsCollection"></xref> class.
Adds the specified cache configuration element to the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheSettingsCollection"></xref> collection.
The memory cache configuration element to add.
Clears all elements from the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheSettingsCollection"></xref> collection.
Gets the type of the configuration collection.
The type of the collection.
Gets the index of the specified cache configuration element in the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheSettingsCollection"></xref> collection.
The cache configuration element to get the index for.
The index of the memory cache configuration element.
Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheElement"></xref> item that has the specified index.
The zero-based index of the item in the collection.
The element at the specified index.
Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheElement"></xref> item that has the specified key.
A unique identifier for the item.
The item that is specified by the key.
Removes the specified cache configuration element from the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheSettingsCollection"></xref> class.
The memory cache configuration element to remove.
Removes the cache configuration element at the specified location in the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheSettingsCollection"></xref> class.
The zero-based index at which to remove the memory cache configuration element.
